title: Searching for some nice people to play with!
body:
Hey guys, 
I came here to New Zealand a short time ago. But i still feel like playing my favourite game. So I created an oceanian account, but i have no people to play with. Maybe one of you guys might like to play with me, although I´m just like level six and with two tier runes :D
cheers, Meria!

replies.body:
Firstly, welcome! 
Played on and off for a long time (back before OCE server). I would rather lose with friends than occasionally win with strangers, gotta have friends first! ^_^
More than welcome to add me 'Mukvi269'

Feel free to add me DarkPrincess669 Im at level 23 but only been playing a few weeks so very new to the game.
Always looking for new friends to play with
Could be been, add "Cuddly Panda" although I'd probably have to jump on a smurf or make a new account or something. Are you new to the game, or what rank were you on other servers?
Yay that's nice to find some people :) for those wondering, I was silver II on euw ^^
